descript: Fight in 10 immersive levels across the galaxy, from a war-torn Earth to a frozen Volterite city. Multiple weapons and powers: Run, shoot, drive vehicles and pilot a mech to defeat your enemies.
Scrat's hunt for his favorite acorn has opened a crack in the Earth's crust, sending the animals scurrying for safety.
Make your way through 80 action-packed missions & a blockbuster story mode! Team up with the wildest characters to take over Las Vegas!
Feel the story's dramatic intensity by also playing the villain, Edward Page. The first Gameloft title powered by the Havok Engine for amazing ragdoll effects!
Enjoy the most beautiful war game on smartphone with outstanding graphics & animations! Engage in breathtaking battles across the globe and unleash deadly power-ups to crush your enemy!
njoy exhilarating dual-stick shooter action! Shred through wave after wave of crazy zombies. Zap, boil & burn with 20 wicked 'n' wild weapons.
Rediscover farming adventure in the new Green Farm! Take on the challenging task of restoring a manor with the help of friends and neighbors!
Draw your ropes and bounce everywhere to make your Ninja reach deep space! Shorter ropes make longer shots, but beware of the fall if you miss!
Utilize your brothers to gain a tactical advantage! Unlock new allies. Upgrade them into seasoned soldiers! Smooth cover-based 3rd-person action with free movement.
An infamous poacher and his lackey are threatening animals of the wilderness by stealing them from their families!
